website_summaries.verdict: A speedy little camera with a long lens, the Panasonic Lumix DMC-SZ7 performs beyond its tiny price tag.
pros: The Panasonic Lumix DMC-SZ7 delivers fast shooting performance and very good photo and movie quality in a slim package with a wide, long lens
cons: The SZ7's battery life could be better, and its pictures probably won't thrill pixel peepers

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: It should be said that I have owned three Panasonic Lumix cameras and this is by far the best of the lot. The high-def videos are incredible, the photos I take are wonderful and the features on the camera...well, I'll never use them all. Lightweight with a big display, I like being able to shoot a video and take a snapshot as the video is filming. I take it everywhere. I searched for this particular model based in a review I read somewhere and they were right. I picked the Panasonic because the controls are all so similar to the other models I've owned and it was a great choice.
customer_reviews.author: Ol' Reg

customer_reviews.title: Why Buy This Camera
customer_reviews.text: It's a great little camera. I have bought several Canon Elphs (also quite good) over the years-this is as good or better. Good battery life, nice pics, lots of options. But it's up against "smart phones." If you have a smart phone, do you need this too? Ask yourself why. If you want a small point and shoot and are not a pro photographer on National Geographics payroll, this is a damn nice, sturdy camera
customer_reviews.author: mrag

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera for point and shoot use
customer_reviews.text: This camera? Takes awesome photos! It's a point and shoot for me (I have a larger digital SLR that I can use for artistic type stuff) and it's small enough that I can stick it in almost any pocket and go. It's been particularly useful in helping me document installation procedures or steps in a process. I installed a fuse box on my motorcycle and wanted to build a sort of "how-to" for other folks to use. I just stuck the camera in my pants leg pocket, pulled it out to take photos when I completed a step, and stuck it back in my pocket. Very useful and it took fantastic, crisp, close-up photos very well.
customer_reviews.author: Steph Moore

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, great price
customer_reviews.text: Purchased about 4 months ago. Have had no problems with it. I have a camcorder which is pretty small, but still bulky, especially compared to this camera... it's very slim and lightweight. The price was reasonable too. I'd definitely recommend it to a friend if they were looking for a camera. If you're looking for compatible products, I purchased it with the Panasonic Lumix Leather Black Slim Case for FS62/ FS7/ FS15/ FS25 (DMW-PSS13XEK) and the Transcend 8 GB Class 10 SDHC Flash Memory Card (TS8GSDHC10E), and have been happy with both of those products too.
customer_reviews.author: Grant

customer_reviews.title: camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera was purchased for a gift for my sister. It arrived timely and in excellent condition. As we reviewed the manual were quite pleased with all that could be accomplished with this small camera along with ease of use. The size is perfect, small enough to slip into a pocket and yet powerful enough to take vibrant photographs and even videos with sound. I ordered it because I had an older Panasonic Lumix which has proved most satisfactory with ease of use and quality of photos so. My sister enjoyed borrowing mine so I am sure she will greatly enjoy this upgraded one. [...]
customer_reviews.author: Doris Engish

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic camera at a fantastic price!
customer_reviews.text: I got this camera for $125 and it was a steal! I have century become hooked n Panasonic cameras and this camera justifies that addiction even more. It is fantastic. The picture quality is great, and I was pleasantly surprised at the speed of the shutter. I can continuously take pictures with or without the flash and not miss a beat. Even more amazing is the weight of this cams. It is soooooo light. I have a Panasonic micro 4/3 camera, which I love, but there are times I want a smaller camera with me and I am happy to take this camera on those occasions. Fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great camera, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Great camera, easy to use, beautiful photos. The problem...my wife rarely uses it, and I have too many cameras already, both digital and a large collection of (by now) vintage film camers.
customer_reviews.author: John F. Weber

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This camera does everything I need. Takes great pictures & videos and has more features than I'd ever require. One of the main selling points for me was getting so much optical zoom in a cheap camera that fits in your pocket. I got it about 9 months ago when it was only $133, but it's still a great camera in the price range. Anything without AA batteries is a deal breaker for some people, but I don't mind plugging it in to charge it and a charge lasts a really long time anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Mike S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This small light weight camera is freakin awesome! I'm no expert photographer and I'm not trying to win any Pulitzer Prize, but this takes really nice pictures indoor and outdoor. It turns on fast has a fast focus and snaps pics really quick. You do have to play with the settings a little but it's simple to set up. Plus the videos it takes are like having an expensive video camera. The sound recording for video is perfect. I would recommend this pocket camera to anyone it's tough to I dropped it once and nothing happened no problems.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: light and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This purchase has not arrived, but I am replacing an identical model with screen damage. The camera is small, light and easy to use. On the auto setting it takes very nice pictures and you can record video footage with the touch of a button. The simplicity of the camera pleases me a lot. I don't need or want the extra complications of internet capability on the newer models as I don't have any desire to email people pictures from my camera.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Great point-and-shoot at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I'm no photographer, but when I use this I feel like maybe I have some ray of hope. (Okay, not really, I'm hopeless.) This is great for taking pictures in whatever setting you want - vacation, cute dog pics, creeping on your neighbor (kidding, don't do that.), etc. Pictures always end up looking great. The camera itself is a nice size, making it not too bulky to carry around for everyday use. Additionally, it takes great videos at full 1080p resolution. The only downside is that the charging is done by plugging the camera into a cable. Meh.
customer_reviews.author: Francis N

customer_reviews.title: Exellent low price camera
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera because I wanted a decent camera without paying a lot of money. I am very happy with this choice. It's capabilities exceed what I was expecting. I appreciate the capability to either take still pictures or high quality video. Also, this camera is very compact so it is very easy to carry. It fits easily into a shirt pocket. It has the best zoom capability that I could find in its price range. The HDMI output port is very nice so you can play your videos on your flat screen TV.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Retiree

customer_reviews.title: Horrible warranty service
customer_reviews.text: This has nothing to do with the seller of the camera. The camera worked great for a little over a week after which it broke. It took Panasonic a whole month before they looked at the camera. Their solution was to send me a "comparable" camera as a replacement. The problem was that they where going to send a far inferior camera as a replacement, one that retails for half of the SZ7! After insisting, they offered a refund of my purchase price, which will take 6 to 7 weeks to process!!!! So, buy a camera which breaks after a week, then wait 3 month's before it gets resolved! The worst consumer experience ever. Don't buy Panasonic!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Klaus

customer_reviews.title: Lumix SZ7 takes care of much of my reporting needs
customer_reviews.text: So many pictures, so much information in such a short time. Lumix SZ7 takes care of much of my reporting needs at work. No longer do I stick my head among pipelines, and get banged while obtaining a model number. When a vendor wants to know what happened, I take a video and send it to him (and his boss). Somebody screws up, out come my friend Lumix SZ7 and its no longer my word against his. Panasonic. The power of the picture, the majesty of the video!
customer_reviews.author: C. J. Wallbight

customer_reviews.title: Great digicam for the price
customer_reviews.text: For a lightweight, high quality, low price point and shoot it is hard to beat this camera, which now sports a Leica lens. I had an earlier version of this camera and was heartbroken when someone dropped it and the extending lens stopped functioning. I am much happier with this camera. Though I do miss using standard AA batteries, but that made the camera a bit bulkier and heavier. Not the back up battery fits in the carrying case pouch. The video sound quality is decent as well.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Jay

customer_reviews.title: Video stills are blotchy and blurry. There seems to be no way to adjust quality.
customer_reviews.text: I take a lot of videos during rehearsals and productions for a local theater company. I rely a lot on grabbing individual still frames from video clips, but the still images from this camera look like they were run through a watercolor image filter. I bought this camera to replace a similarly-priced camera from another manufacturer. The other camera gave me no problems under identical conditions.
customer_reviews.author: DGJerz

customer_reviews.title: Did not hold up
customer_reviews.text: I waited a half a year to write a review as I assume any and every camera is durable enough out of the box. Picture quality is good; camera was fine for first few months. However, it did not survive a trip to Italy. Being opened 20-30 times a day while sightseeing, the lense began to have troubles retracting when turned off. Then, it failed to open all together during the middle of the trip and was out of commission. I don't think this is a high volume, high use camera based on my experience.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lutton

customer_reviews.title: This is a good camera.
customer_reviews.text: Keep your expectations reasonable and you will like this camera. I own a Nikon D40 and knew this would not replace a DSLR. What it did was take fantastic pictures in outdoor daylight and indoors with good light available. In low light situations it produces ok results. But I knew and expected that going in. I bought this refurbished for $79 and it was a steal. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Pennstater2005

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for casual photography
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for a recent trip because I wanted something that was better than my phone but didn't want to lug around the two pound high end digital with all the accessories. This camera was perfect! Small enough to slip into my purse, yet picture quality is excellent. Low light pics were exceptional. I'm very happy with it. I got a spare battery so I would always have one charged and ready to go.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Prior

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera
customer_reviews.text: What I like best about this camera is the ability to take photographs in low light conditions without using flash. The pictures are clear and crisp and it's so easy to use. I'm a fan of Panasonic products in general, they just work. I've had Sony, Fuji and Canon cameras in the past and I like this one much better all around.
customer_reviews.author: MFK

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Does everything I want in a Point & Shoot. It is pretty small and if you have big hands (or small hands) you have to take care to not drop it (always use the wrist strap). Good value for the money. Bought a 8G EZShare memory card for WIFI connectivity. Can wirelessly download to my iPad which I like for traveling. Also bought the Wasabi charger & 2 batteries for $20.
customer_reviews.author: Gene

customer_reviews.title: great little camera
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a nice little camera to take to Italy....read all of the wonderful reviews about this camera and bought it. The pictures are great, the panoramic feature is wonderful and it zooms and holds a charge forever. it was easy enough to keep in any purse or even a pocket. We have a large fancy camera but who wants to drag that on a vacation.
customer_reviews.author: YAYA

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great point & shoot. Excellent photo quality, true colors, sharp. Good zoom and flash capability. Small enough to pop in your pocket. Has a lot of nice features.
customer_reviews.author: acb

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this camera
customer_reviews.text: This is my third Panasonic Lumix in 8 years (I have to stop dropping them!). It's difficult, if not impossible to find it at retail stores, and for the money, it's by far the best camera for point and shoot photography on the go. While I love the camera in my smartphone, not having an interchangeable SD card challenges me when I know I'll be taking lots of pictures. This is the perfect solution. Thanks Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Princess J

customer_reviews.title: Was good for a while then died
customer_reviews.text: Was a great camera, then it died after 9 months. The lens will not go in or out and it happened randomly, not under any kind of unusual or extreme conditions, and the camera had not been particularly heavily used. Despite being within the 12month warranty repeated attempts to contact Panasonic in order to get it fixed/replaced failed - i never got a single response, and then it fell out of warranty period and i gave up and got a replacement. Very disappointing customer service/build quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Richard Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Great for its price
customer_reviews.text: Just got this in the mail today. So far, everything is easy to set up, indoor and outdoor pictures have great quality. Very small and slim, great pocket camera. Takes great videos, and you don't lose too much quality when zooming in. Very nice camera for its size and price, would recommend this. The only thing I don't like is the charging port door which was hard to open. You have to have long fingernails to dig under and push it up, then lift it up on the other side, I almost broke it.
customer_reviews.author: foxhound

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice digital camera, but I have to return it due to some damages of the camera itself.
customer_reviews.author: Torolover

customer_reviews.title: Excellent unit and value... one heads up
customer_reviews.text: Great camera, wish it shot RAW, but you can't have everything. One little thing I wish I had known before I bought it.... the usb socket is a uncommon (but standard) mini-B (8 pin) cable, so if you are like me and misplace your cables regularly, plan on buying a couple of extras for the kit (along with the card reader). But Amazon and Monoprice both stock them, so not too bad.
customer_reviews.author: pixel_pusher

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I got this camera just for a small, capable replacement for my older digital point and shoot. This camera is a great value and had more features than I expected (or will probably use!). I haven't shot enough with it to check out the picture quality or battery life, but so far it looks quite good. I would get it again for its value, function, and ease of use.
customer_reviews.author: Mirinda

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic camera!
customer_reviews.text: I'm by no means a camera or photography fanatic but I certainly want a great quality camera and that's what this is. I did a lot of research and now that I have this camera I can assure you it is top notch quality. It is fast, great focus, tons of features. I particularly like the burst shot, panoramic shot, quick upload time, etc. Can't go wrong with this for a small, point and shoot camera! Excellent quality!
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Marchant

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: Camera works very well. Small, convenient size. Takes good pictures. Uses proprietary USB cable, so spare cables are very expensive, and it's one more USB cable style to travel with. Since there are so many similar cameras available, would recommend getting one with a more generic USB port.
customer_reviews.author: Roquie

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful, Panasonic Lumix SZ7 14.1  ILove, love,love this camera
customer_reviews.text: Took this camera to Hawaii , and absolutly love it. Takes beautiful sharp pics,love the wide field of view. The zoom is fantastic ,took action surfing shots and they turned out sharp with excellant detail.Beautiful color in 'happy ' mode. I also like the ease of use and is very fast , with a fast class 10 sd card.I will never buy another let down Canon camera again.
customer_reviews.author: nancy j cockcroft

customer_reviews.title: Very good compact camera
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the price Full featured and high quality photos Bought this model because various reviews indicated it has the fastest cycle time between shots of similar cameras - seems to be true in my experience - recycles fast both with and without flash, much fast than other compact cameras I've owned
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Hershey

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!  I'm not much of a picture taker
customer_reviews.text: but I got this one to document our nasty living situation in the anticipation of submitting to the court. LOL, very elderly FIL's house with very nasty, spoiled, violent, tantrum-throwing adult SIL and we can do nothing about it for now except document everything. Did this make enough words to submit?
customer_reviews.author: BestDayofMyLife

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful, durable camera
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful camera, which has lasted me a long time. As in, many, many years of normal use, including travel, adventure sports, etc. Intuitive controls, great picture quality, easy interface.
customer_reviews.author: Yerric

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: My wife & I were looking for a small pocket size camera for when we do not want to lug around our Cannon T2i. Our major wanted feature was being able to take picture quickly. Our past point and shoot cameras simply could/can not do this without substantial lag. This Panasonic can really snap them quickly! The pictures are great!
customer_reviews.author: Musky78

customer_reviews.title: Love my Panasonic Lumix SZ7!
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera! It takes wonderful pictures, zooms WAY in, perfect for sports shots of my Grandson's little league games....great close-up flower shots, scenery. The only thing I miss is a viewfinder. The battery lasts a loooong time, I haven't even had t charge it yet! I've taken lots of pictures, lots of zooming and "unzooming", playback, etc.
customer_reviews.author: GrammyCrackers

customer_reviews.title: Awesome camera at an awesome price
customer_reviews.text: Get this for my wife based on the customer reviews. She needed something that is very easy to use, but wanted to be able to take good pictures. This camera delivers those things and more. I will recommend to anyone I know that needs to upgrade their digital camera.
customer_reviews.author: procore04

customer_reviews.title: Love the size and clarity of the image
customer_reviews.text: I have misplaced my instruction book, and that is a problem because the images on the camera, itself, are not self-explanatory. But, the camera, itself, is great. Love the size and the fact it has a long-lasting battery system. My son has two Panasonics, one like this, and he sold me on it.
customer_reviews.author: J.H.D.

customer_reviews.title: Nice small and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The camera is as expected. Small easy to fit in a pocket or small purse. Picture quality is very good. Easy to use. Battery life is ok, on a scale of never running out being great. Only thing I would reconsider is the rechargeable battery vs taking a couple extra batteries along.
customer_reviews.author: MaDaHada

customer_reviews.title: Carry Everywhere
customer_reviews.text: I have been a professional photographer all my life and there are just some things that I can't get with my Nikon D700s. Sometimes that gear is disruptive, sometimes it's not fast enough on the draw. Yet the shots the much smaller SZ7 delivers are superb. Sure there are things I might have preferred like completely manual zoom control or the flash farther away from the lens, but not this small or inexpensive. I carry this everywhere now. I also bought a spare battery and external charger right away. The battery seems to be the same on most of this size Lumix.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Barich

customer_reviews.title: Great pictures at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my girlfriend. She needed something light and compact when traveling Eurpose. Takes really sharp pictures and has some decent battery life for a compact digital camera. She loved it and the pictures she has printed out look great.
customer_reviews.author: MT

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: Bought this camera for a trip to Bryce Canyon and the GSENM. What a great little camera. Fits well in a bag, and the optical zoom is amazing. Took some great pictures. Blew them up to 8 x 10 size with no distortion. Takes SLR type and quality picts!
customer_reviews.author: T. Riordan

customer_reviews.title: tiny, easy to use, fits in a pocket
customer_reviews.text: I needed a point and shoot camera to keep in my pocket at work. Amazon had this on sale and I own Panasonic's Micro 4/3's cameras personally, so I figured it would take good to excellent pictures. It hunts a little in low light, but takes excellent pictures. It is fairly quick to turn on and off, and easily fits in a pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Friskers

customer_reviews.title: Panasonic support is terrible.
customer_reviews.text: Within months had dust on the sensor despite careful handling. Panasonic support is terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Takes great photos and easy to use. Fits in pocket easily.
customer_reviews.author: David Ivey

customer_reviews.title: Are you a mom?  Do you like to have pics of your kids?  Do you like to spend less than $150?
customer_reviews.text: If you like to take pics of kids and actually capture a smile this is the camera. I have spent hundreds of dollars on cameras. I've tried and returned less expensive cameras. This is it. Someday, I might get out into the mommy blog world to spread the news. The camera is quick and the lens is amazing. FINALLY after 8 years of digital cameras, one that fits in my purse and does the job I need it to. It is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: C. Moul

customer_reviews.title: Very good picture quality in most settings
customer_reviews.text: Very good picture quality in most settings. Particularly like feature which allows cell phone to become remote when the appropriate app is downloaded.
customer_reviews.author: James D Pettigrew, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: Love the zoom and stability of the camera in such a compact body. Fits perfectly in my hands, not too small or too big. Great quality of picture for the price. I'm not so crazy about the battery compartment door, I haven't had any problems with it opening accidentally yet but I can see it becoming a problem in the future. Overall great camera for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Lore

customer_reviews.title: Lumix SZ7 14.1 MP Digital Camear
customer_reviews.text: Product is fantastic. Couldn't ask for a better camera with all of the features you would want. Like most- once you learn the navigation system you can get excellent quality photos. It's no iPhone- it's BETTER!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin D

customer_reviews.title: I did not like this camera
customer_reviews.text: I tried to like this camera, but the LCD screen is horrible. The pictures that it took were okay, but trying to see them on the LCD screen with the poor viewing angle was an exercise in futility. I returned it for that reason.
customer_reviews.author: Borocay

customer_reviews.title: Fatal flaw with the Lumix SZ7
customer_reviews.text: I love the pictures it takes. I had one Lumix SZ7, and it developed spots -- from other reviews, I gather this is typical. I gave up on my first Lumix and bought a second one. This one I protected diligently so no dust would get into the camera and on to the sensor. Alas, six months later and every picture is ruined. I can edit them out with Photoshop, but that is time consuming. In short, the SZ7 is the last Lumix I will ever buy, despite the good pictures. Getting a new camera every six months isn't my idea of worthwhile!
customer_reviews.author: aspenber

customer_reviews.title: Small, great pictures, good in low light conditions
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a camera that fits in my pocket, has a decent zoom, takes sharp and color neutral pictures (also in low light conditions) and allows for forced flash. This camera has it all and is easy to use. I am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: TG

customer_reviews.title: Dark spots on pic after 8 month of use
customer_reviews.text: I had not a good luck with this camera, totally it is my 4th Panasonic Lumix, many other reviewers seem to have the same problem, after 8 month of use every single pic got a dark spot somewhere, I can retouch them but that is way to time consuming, definitely would not buy it again
customer_reviews.author: Ingrid Kandlbauer

customer_reviews.title: worth for the value we pay
customer_reviews.text: i can rate this product five stars if the battery life is good but if we shoot full HD video continuously for 30 minuets battery comes to one point. if we take pictures with flash it will give 250 to 300 pictures. This is best one with features like panorama, 3D and sport mode. i could able to take clear pictures of my daughter while playing with sports mode. my previous camera gave blurry images for fast moving objects.
customer_reviews.author: gvgrao

customer_reviews.title: Looked New
customer_reviews.text: Camera arrived quickly and was packaged well. It was used as soon as it arrived. It looked like a new camera and phas performed well. Takes good pic and does well with video also. Very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: R. M. Smith

customer_reviews.title: So much better than my 5 year old Lumix
customer_reviews.text: At this price, it is really worth upgrading an older camera. This camera is much faster than my old one. I do NOT like the recommended case (Case Logic TBC-302), however. It does NOT have space for the small USB charger.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: That is really good!
customer_reviews.text: nice shoot, and fast.That is really good, and so cheap.You can go to trip with Panasonic Lumix SZ7 anywhere...If you like Paramount's technical so this is your best choice.
customer_reviews.author: ngoclanngo

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Lumix SZ7 mainly based on other reviews and was not disappointed. For a camera in its price range ($85 refurb) the zoom works better than cameras that I have paid twice as much just for the lenses. The picture quality is very good and the look and feel of the camera is great, the only thing I don't like, and its minor, is it doesn't give you many manual mode choices, but that said I would highly recommend this camera to anyone looking for a quality point and shoot.
customer_reviews.author: kevin terry

customer_reviews.title: Panasonic Lumix SZ7
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little camera. I like it better than the Canons I've had. It's compact, easy (minimal controls) and takes very nice videos. The Wasabi Power Battery and Charger Kit and the Case Logic TBC-302 FFP Compact Camera Case are excellent add-ons for a total of $27, shipped. The Wasabi kit includes 2 extra high-capacity batteries (which you need because the one Canon battery that comes with it doesn't last long) with wall and car charger and the Case Logic case is small but holds the camera and the 2 extra batteries. You will need to get an HDMI to Mini HDMI adapter to plug into your TV, and the Viera works great with Panasonic TVs.
customer_reviews.author: R. Mahan

customer_reviews.title: Fine, in the beginning
customer_reviews.text: I was happy with this camera for awhile, but then it got smudges on the inside of the lens. How the heck does that happen?
customer_reviews.author: JANA

customer_reviews.title: a lot of featuers for the money
customer_reviews.text: A great camera for the money It takes great pictures, is small enough to fit in your pocket. The options for taking a picture area amazing. Also takes videos although I haven't used that feature yet.
customer_reviews.author: EDWARD

customer_reviews.title: I like mine so much that I bought this one for my wife.
customer_reviews.text: Great zoom, easy to store in pocket, bought battery charger and better batteries through Amazon cheap, great videos, auto focus makes me a genius, quick efficient transfer to Iphoto album on my IMac.
customer_reviews.author: striper2

customer_reviews.title: Panasonic Lumix SZ7 Camera
customer_reviews.text: This little camera is perfect for traveling when you don't want to carry the heavier more cumbersome digital equipment. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Zipper

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and small enough for a pocket. I use it all the time and it hasn't failed me yet! I use it a lot to make videos, it gives excellent quality. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Cochise

customer_reviews.title: Great zoom
customer_reviews.text: Camera is exactly as advertised. Just happens to be almost too small for arthritic hands. Pictures are clear. Camera is easy to operate.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Lee Parker

customer_reviews.title: Very nice camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: The camera was everything that everyone said it would be. I'm no photographer by no means, so my inputs are definitely laymen. The separate switch for the viewing mode is convenient. It also uses the large flash card (which we had numerous from previous cameras) which is nice. Most other cameras this small use the small ones. The zoom works nice and the camera takes incredibly good pictures. I'm very pleased with it!
customer_reviews.author: Joel  Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly, works great. Easy to use. My daughter uses it and it takes great pictures, low light, as good or better than expected. Always happy with Panasonic cameras so far.
customer_reviews.author: dunion

customer_reviews.title: Camera lasted a little over a year, then stopped working.
customer_reviews.text: In June of 2013 I bought this camera to replace a loved older Lumix camera version that I has lost. It had a slowish speed always, and while on holiday overseas in January 2015 this camera decided to stop working. I know electronics don't last forever, but one would assume longer than 1.5 years. I am disappointed overall and I doubt I'll reorder another Lumix.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Gift for my dad!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my dad before our family trip to New York City. He loves taking pictures with it, and out of all the cameras that we took on the trip (Samsung WB150F) it took the best pictures!
customer_reviews.author: Daniella Escalona

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: No real complaints except for red eye issues. Not sure if I'm doing something wrong or if there is something inherently wrong with taking pics in darker rooms. Everything looks good otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Beanstock13

customer_reviews.title: Very good camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera is perfect for what I wanted and needed. Small compact easy to operate. I love the zoom and the panorama capabilities. It's great for vacation photos.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good point and shoot
customer_reviews.text: It takes great photos and is so easy to carry even in your shirt pocket. Not sure if it is better than the iPhone camera but certainly more versatile.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Sydell

customer_reviews.title: FUN CAMERA
customer_reviews.text: TAKES GREAT PICS, HAVE HAD THIS FOR A WHILE NOW AND I JUST LOVE IT. ALL KINDS OF FEATURES TO ENJOY
customer_reviews.author: JayKnee

customer_reviews.title: Very affordable versatile sweet camera. Unfortunately now after 2+ years the lens ...
customer_reviews.text: Very affordable versatile sweet camera. Unfortunately now after 2+ years the lens closure gets stuck and a black spot appears in picture. May be not the best quality. But still 4 of 5 stars for its performance.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Ashauer

customer_reviews.title: Panasonic Lumix SZ7
customer_reviews.text: Everything works great! No complaints. Got a nice camera at 2/3 the price. I have read that there are less complaints with refurbished items and they cost less. :)
customer_reviews.author: J. Stokes

customer_reviews.title: Lumix S27 14.1 MP
customer_reviews.text: My wife is having a great time with this camera. She gave me her old Lumix and says that this is quite an improvement on what she had. She is taking some great pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Nissanka Goonetilleke

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this camera!
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this camera. I have a Nikon dSLR but always like a pocket sized camera for in my purse. I needed something to replace the crappy Canon SD1400is which lasted only a year. I choose this camera because of the size, simple settings, and the HD video. Pictures seem to be very true to color. Below is a link to a video I took the night after the camera arrived. Keep in mind that I was a couple of rows back and it was a dark casino. I am very pleased with the quality. [...]
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Tiedt

customer_reviews.title: ok for the price but...
customer_reviews.text: Has Panasonic sacrificed focus for zoom? Getting a sharp image is almost impossible. Not bad but not that good. It's ok if you don't want to enlarge your image. How about less mp and better focus. The panorama photo stitching is cool.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Emmet

customer_reviews.title: Great for a compact camera
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a great little camera you could put in your shirt pocket, this is the one. Great photos, cheap price. Bought a reconditioned one. Seems new and $35 cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Allen B

customer_reviews.title: Great snappy little camera.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this camera for my wife and she really likes it. I especially like the speed of this thing. We have three young kids and are constantly snapping photos, so it was important for us to have a camera that could take the picture fast enough before the kids moved or looked away. The HD video is also very nice, especially with the two separate microphones for stereo sound. This is a great little camera.
customer_reviews.author: Tony F.

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband for Christmas and he loves it. It's a good size, and although it's small it is still easy to use the buttons, even though he has big hands. The LCD is nice a big.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl

customer_reviews.title: Great pocket camera!
customer_reviews.text: I did some research to determine the most robust pocket camera. Lumix won! Has everything I wanted including full HD 1080 P easy to use and nothing to figure out!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to love it
customer_reviews.text: Form factor, ease of use and price are all great attributes of this camera. Image quality does not quite come up to my expectations especially for travel/landscape photos. This camera is very easy to use and if your need is for a handy, reliable camera and you need only small images (web, 4x5 prints) you might be delighted with this one. If you're a pixel peeper - keep looking as you won't be satisfied upon examination of image details. I also own the DMC-LX7 "big brother" to this camera which is more costly & bulkier but of superb image quality.
customer_reviews.author: David G.

customer_reviews.title: Well Done
customer_reviews.text: Given as a gift. Great camera. Most people don't take advantage of the wonderful Leica lens.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Dickens

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for a small compact camera to take with us to Europe and we found it in this camera. This is a great camera, small enough to fit in your pocket and very light, yet a very powerful camera. I am very happy with the speed of taking pictures, other cameras the wait from the time you push the button until the time the picture is taken is to long and you miss the shot, not with this camera, very fast.
customer_reviews.author: mv

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Camera
customer_reviews.text: As a point 'n shoot, its a beauty! Decent crisp images and the video function records in HD. The price seems well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Patty Caro

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera
customer_reviews.text: The shutter speed isn't as fast as the You Tube review, but it's a nice little camera to carry with in a pocket. Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: B. Staton

customer_reviews.title: Excellent all around camera.  Great pictures, fast focs and quick picture capture.
customer_reviews.text: Fast efficient picture taking. Fairly intuitive for most of the normal modes. Autofocus works quickly. Also very quick to take picture once shutter button is pressed. Very little waiting, flash or not, to capture picture which is so much nicer than the 3 other similar type cameras I've used over the past 10 years.
customer_reviews.author: Dave W.

customer_reviews.title: Great Size and Quality.
customer_reviews.text: This camera is a great travel size. I love using it. Has a great quality picture also.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Ellen Hill

customer_reviews.title: Big Value in Small Product
customer_reviews.text: I got this camera for my father and he liked it very much. Since I bought it for him, he did not stop clicking the pictures from it. I think big value comes in small product.
customer_reviews.author: SACHIN KURMUDE

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Great pictures, some picture noise on night shots. But excellent value vis-a-vis the sister Leica cameras, which tend to be 4-5x the price. Battery could last a little longer but can still manage 200-300 pictures on one charge,
customer_reviews.author: Mike T

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Camera
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy using this point and shoot--it has great lens quality and is very easy to use. It has lots of features and is fairly intuitive.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Panasonic Lumix SZ7 14.1 - Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera to replace a Kodak camera. I have not used it much but the specs. appears to be very appealing.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie from Maryland

customer_reviews.title: Very good for the money
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in as an addition to a canon rebel which is a big camera - this Panasonic is very light, flexible and shoots well above its class. Photos of a wide range of conditions produced bright, crisp results. Do recommend this camera for point and shoot type applications, where you need that extra quality dimension you look for in more expensive alternatives.
customer_reviews.author: toonus

customer_reviews.title: Perfect camera for cruising
customer_reviews.text: Small, but powerful, great in low light. It was perfect for traveling and it takes amazing pictures. We bought it because our big camera is bulky. And to our surprise this camera took pictures as good as the big camera.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: terrific
customer_reviews.text: I've only taken a few pictures and I'm most anxious to put tit through more of its paces. Lovely color and definition so far.
customer_reviews.author: M. Dee Medley

customer_reviews.title: A great inexpensive camera
customer_reviews.text: Small, fits anywhere, takes great photos, not much more to say. It's great, I'd buy it again, you should too!
customer_reviews.author: L. W.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful clear pictures wit ease
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this camera! The ease of it is amazing, and for a point and shoot the pictures are crisp and clear.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: User friendly
customer_reviews.text: I received the camera just in time to pack for Ireland. The compact size made it easy to carry. The camera took crisp photos, whether they were close up, telephoto, low light or bright light. I look forward to reading the manual for further tips on using the camera. The camera does need to be charged each night to insure adequate battery.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth A Fox

product_meta.title: Panasonic Lumix SZ7 14.1 MP High Sensitivity MOS Digital Camera with 10x Optical Zoom (Black)
product_meta.description:
Style:SZ7-BlackThe LUMIX DMC-SZ7 combines a powerful 10x optical zoom with a 25mm ultra-wide angle LEICA DC VARIO-ELMAR lens, in a slim and compact body, making it extremely portable and easy to carry. It can also shoot full-High Definition, 1920 x 1080 60i videos and with Light Speed AF, it has a super-fast focus response time of approximately 0.1 second - making it easy to capture spontaneous must-have photos.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


 The Lumix DMC-SZ7, a part of the Lumix SZ-Series of digital cameras combines a powerful 10x optical zoom with a 25mm ultra-wide angle LEICA DC VARIO-ELMAR lens, in a slim and compact body, making it extremely portable and easy to carry. The Lumix SZ7 has 14.1 megapixels and can also shoot full-High Definition, 1920 x 1080 60i videos and with Light Speed AF, it has a super-fast focus response time of approximately 0.1 second – making it easy to capture spontaneous must-have photos. 

Panasonic Lumix SZ7 Highlights 

Shooting Modes
The Lumix SZ7 features two new shooting modes – Miniature Effect and Panorama Shot. In Miniature Effect mode, the peripherals are defocused while saturation and contrast is emphasized to make the picture like a diorama. Video recorded in Miniature Effect mode is played back in 10x fast-forwarding, making it comical and fun to watch*1. Panorama Shot makes it possible to shoot a horizontal or vertical panoramic image by taking consecutive shots and then overlaying the photos for the effect of a panoramic photo. Furthermore, the Lumix SZ7 feature Creative Retouch which includes six filters -Toy Effect, Soft Focus Dynamic Monochrome, Expressive, High Key and Retro, each of which give the photo a more artistic look. This camera also features an Auto Retouch function that adjusts contrast and brightness to give the photo a different look – all with a single press of the button. 
*1 Sound will not be recorded with [MINIATURE EFFECT] in Creative Control Mode and approximately 1/10 of the time period is recorded. (If you record for 10 minutes, the resulting motion picture recording will be approximately 1 minute long) 

iA (Intelligent Auto) Mode
To help ensure that the Lumix SZ7 is easy to use, it features Panasonic's popular iA (Intelligent Auto) mode. In iA mode, a suite of technologies are automatically engaged and the camera chooses the best setting based on the shooting environment. For instance, iA includes the new High Dynamic Range, Intelligent Handheld Nightshot and Motion Deblur together with AF Tracking, Intelligent ISO Control, MEGA O.I.S., Face Recognition, Intelligent Scene Selector and Intelligent Exposure. 

Additional Features 

 * 3.0-inch Intelligent LCD that automatically adjusts the backlight based on the environment's lighting 
 * MOS sensor to support full-HD video 
 * USB power charging in addition to the conventional AC power supply 
 * 3D Photo Mode allows the user to take 20 panning shots and then the camera automatically selects the two most suitable images – one for the right eye and one for the left eye – to synthesize a 3D composite. 
 * Dedicated video record button which lets users instantly start recording a video without having to make any extra settings. Additionally, the full 10x optical zoom is available in video recording mode 
 * High-quality stereo sound via Dolby® Digital Stereo Creator accompanies the realistic HD videos. The stereo zoom microphone comes with zoom noise reduction system, and the Wind Cut function helps to block noise from background wind

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars291 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
